Class DistMatrix

A symmetric distance matrix storing distances between coords. As the matrix is strictly triangular, only the upper triangular matrix excluding the diagonal is stored.

    • Defined in index.ts:117

    Return the distance between coord at index i and the coord at index j. i must be less than or equal to j.
